message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,600,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is significantly below what I consider a fair price for this product.  Its value goes beyond your initial assessment. To move forward, I'd be willing to accept $1,450,000.  This reflects my position while acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,450,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $1,200,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
